code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import'./nav.css';import noteContext from"../context/noteContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NoteItems=props=>{const contex=useContext(noteContext);const{deletenote}=contex;const{note,updateNote}=props;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4 my-3 ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card my-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body bg-light",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{children:note.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{children:note.description})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{children:note.tag})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-regular fa-pen-to-square mx-2",onClick:()=>{updateNote(note);}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-trash mx-2",onClick:()=>{deletenote(note._id);}})})]})})});};export default NoteItems;
